CustomField.formula: IF(((ISPICKVAL( Classification_c__c , "Growth") && Total_NRT_Adjusted__c > 0) || ISPICKVAL( Classification_c__c , "New Business") || ISPICKVAL( Classification_c__c , "Cross Sell") || ISPICKVAL( Classification_c__c , "Win Back") || ISPICKVAL( Classification_c__c , "New Business - One Off")) ,1, 0)
CustomField.label: {Hidden} Use for NRT Report
